name: pre-work-assignment-for-advanced-class
description: This project serves as the pre-work assignment for the Advanced React class with [Code the Dream](https://codethedream.org/about/), a non-profit organization dedicated to providing tech education to individuals from diverse backgrounds. The aim of this project is to showcase proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.  The [requirements](https://codethedream.org/open-adv-pre-work/) were outlined by Code the Dream.
